sentences.sContent: The country is at peace with its neighbours for the first time in years.
sentences.sCn: 这是多年来该国与其邻国第一次和平共处。

sentences.sContent: By the end of the century, France had made peace with Britain.
sentences.sCn: 到那个世纪末，法国和英国议和了。

sentences.sContent: a city where people of different religions have lived together in peace for centuries
sentences.sCn: 不同宗教的人们和平共处数百年的城市

sentences.sContent: efforts to bring peace to the region
sentences.sCn: 为该地区争取和平的努力

sentences.sContent: a dangerous situation which threatens world peace
sentences.sCn: 威胁世界和平的危险状况
不稳定的和平局面维持到1939年。

sentences.sContent: the peace treaty that ended the First World War
sentences.sCn: 终结第一次世界大战的和平条约

phrases.pCn: 和平地；安静，宁静；安祥地
vi. 不扰乱治安；阻止别人扰乱治安；守法
内心的平静；内在和平；安心
与…言归于好；与…讲和；休战

words.tran: 和平的，爱好和平的；平静的
维护和平的；执行停火协定的

trans.tranOther: a situation in which there is no war or fighting
